```{r}
Pone <- function(n = 10, k = 5, strategy = 1, nreps = 50){
  # n: max # boxes to be opened; k: some prisoner's number; strategy: 1, 2, 3; nreps: # simulations.
  cards <- sample(1 : (2 * n), 2 * n, replace = FALSE)
  successes <- 0
  if (strategy == 1){
    i <- 1
    next_box <- k
    while (i <= n){
      card <- cards[next_box]
      if (card != k){
        i <- i + 1
        next_box <- card
      } else {
        return (1)
      } 
    } 
    return (0)
  }
  
  for (j in 1 : nreps){
    if (strategy == 2){
      i <- 1
      next_box <- sample(1 : (2 * n), 1)
      while (i <= n){
        card <- cards[next_box]
        if (card != k){
          i <- i + 1
          next_box <- card
        } else {
          successes <- successes + 1
          break
        } 
      } 
    }
    
    if (strategy == 3){
      i <- 1
      next_box <- sample(1 : (2 * n), n, replace = FALSE)
      while (i <= n){
        card <- cards[next_box[i]]
        if (card != k){
          i <- i + 1
        } else {
          successes <- successes + 1
          break
        } 
      } 
    }
  }
  return (successes / nreps)
}
```
